Articles.Content:
This is part of the reason that I didn't discover that we weren't already flying into space regularly until I was five years old. One Saturday morning, I walked into the living room and turned on the TV, only to discover that cartoons had been pre-empted by a Gemini launch. I was ticked off, until my oldest sister pointed out that NASA animations were kind of like cartoons. They were about as crude as this, but with more interesting dialogue.

https://youtu.be/C--WnkXu4oI

Edited March 15, 2016 by SSgt Baloo
